categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Rax was a Human male who was a Rebel Elite Commando. He accompanied Leia, Chewbacca, Han Solo, and Luke Skywalker to Kiva on a mission to stop Project Starscream.

Rax was a Rebel Elite Commando. On a mission to Kiva, he was in charge of baby-sitting Zak Arranda, Tash Arranda, and the baby, Eppon. After the death of his elite partners Meex, Bergan and Tino, he was placed in charge of taking care of the baby Eppon, but was killed by him, as his partners had been.
